title: Integrate Gemini and ChatGPT for AI logo generation

requirements.text: Update the PromptLogoGenerator component to integrate with both Google Gemini API and OpenAI ChatGPT API for generating logos from text prompts, replacing the current placeholder SVG generation system

quotes: Use gemini and ChatGPT generate a logo

acceptanceCriteria: PromptLogoGenerator component calls both Gemini and ChatGPT APIs based on provider selection
Generated logos from AI services are displayed in the preview area
Error handling is implemented for API failures
Loading states are shown during logo generation

requirements.text: Update the useAILogoGeneration hook to implement actual API calls to Google Gemini and OpenAI ChatGPT services for logo generation, removing the placeholder SVG generation logic

quotes: Use gemini and ChatGPT generate a logo

acceptanceCriteria: Hook makes authenticated requests to Gemini API when 'google' provider is selected
Hook makes authenticated requests to ChatGPT API when 'openai' provider is selected
Generated logo images are returned as data URLs or blob URLs
API errors are properly caught and surfaced to the UI

requirements.text: Ensure generated logos from Gemini and ChatGPT can be used in both 2D and 3D animation workflows after generation

quotes: use the logo design in the

acceptanceCriteria: Generated logos are passed to the parent component via onLogoGenerated callback
Generated logos work with the existing logo upload flow
Users can proceed to animation editing after logo generation
Generated logos are compatible with both 2D plane texture mode and 3D conversion mode

constraints: Do not change the backend Motoko actor structure
Preserve the existing LogoUploader tab-based interface structure
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Implementing backend API proxy for AI services
Adding new AI providers beyond Gemini and ChatGPT
Changing the overall application workflow or UI layout
